p:
Similarly, as per the WHO COVID-19 Situation Report-201
5 (as on August 8, 2020) have reported the highest number of deaths due to COVID-19 among the developed nations viz. the United States, about 160,000 deaths followed by the Brazil, Mexico, the United Kingdom, Italy, France, Spain, etc. The mortality rate among the developing countries, very low as compared to the developed nations. The data from the developing countries needs to be assessed on a periodic intervals, and as the cause of death also need to be confirmed before declaring the same amid COVID-19 crisis.
